jcr:content.jcr:title: International Center for Elementary Particle Physics

contentheadline.headline: International Center for Elementary Particle Physics

contentrichtext.text: The {{nihongo|'''International Center for Elementary Particle Physics'''|東京大学素粒子物理国際研究センター|Tōkyō Daigaku Soryūshi Butsuri Kokusai Kenkyū Sentā}} is a division of the [[University of Tokyo]], [[Japan]] dedicated to the study of [[particle physics]]. The ICEPP is located on the 10th floor of the Faculty of Science Building #1 at the [[University of Tokyo]]. == External links == * http://www.icepp.s.u-tokyo.ac.jp/icepp-e.html {{coord|35|42|49.9|N|139|45|48.3|E|region:JP-13_type:edu|display=title}} [[Category:University departments in Japan]] [[Category:University of Tokyo]] {{tokyo-university-stub}}
